TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NameScopePropertyAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class NameScopePropertyAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class NameScopePropertyAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定提供 XAML NameScope 值之相關聯類別的屬性。

span.span: Specifies a property of the associated class that provides the XAML namescope value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在典型的物件模型 / 應用程式模型結合使用 XAML 的位置，用來作為 XAML 名稱範圍的類別的類別，通常會使用當做根項目，或支援頁面比喻。In a typical object model / application model combination where XAML is used, the classes that are used as a XAML namescope are the classes that are generally used as root elements, or that support a page metaphor. 這些類別通常會實作和 XAML 名稱範圍由對應到根內容架構的程式設計模型和應用程式模型中的典型 XAML 處理行為。These classes generally implement and the XAML namescope is created corresponding to the root by typical XAML processing behavior in context of a framework's programming model and application model. 如果是使用 XAML 名稱範圍的屬性值會預期要實作的物件和保存實際的 XAML 名稱範圍和它的行為。If is used, the XAML namescope property value is expected to be an object that implements and holds the actual XAML namescope and its behavior. 有此屬性的兩種形式： 僅顯示屬性名稱或型別和屬性。There are two forms for this attribute: property name only, or type and property. 後面的形式只應該用於保存的 XAML 名稱範圍的屬性所在之可附加成員的情況。The latter form should be used only for cases where the property that holds the XAML name scope is an attachable member. 附加的成員項技巧的優點是，服務類別可以實作可支援幾種不同的物件類型的 XAML 名稱範圍概念。The attached member technique has the advantage that service classes can implement a XAML namescope concept that can support several different object types. 這些物件型別則不需要明確地與類別繼承。Those object types then do not need to be explicitly related in class inheritance. 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，這個類別會存在於 WindowsBase WPF 特定組件中。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]， System.Xaml 組件中。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md). ## WPF 使用注意事項WPF Usage Notes 在 WPF 中，此屬性會套用至只有單一的型別， 。In WPF, this attribute is applied to only a single type, . 在此情況下使用屬性的屬性為服務類別及其附加屬性。In this case the attributed property is the service class and its attached property.

summary.span: 取得提供 XAML 名稱範圍的屬性名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the property that provides the XAML namescope.

value.span: 字串值，這是提供 XAML 名稱範圍的屬性名稱。

span.span: A string value that is the name of the property that provides the XAML namescope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 意義取決於是否設定。The meaning of depends on whether is set. 如果為 null，則參考屬性的型別上的屬性。If is null, then references a property on the type being attributed. 如果包含一個值，則上所指定的屬性會參考。If contains a value, then references a property on the indicated .

summary.span: 取得提供 XAML 名稱範圍支援之附加屬性的擁有者類型。

span.span: Gets the owner type of the attached property that provides the XAML namescope support.

value.span: 表示提供 XAML 名稱範圍支援之附加屬性擁有者類型的 值；否則為 。

span.span: A value that is the owner type of the attached property that provides the XAML namescope support, or .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性只會為相關 XAML 名稱範圍實作屬性是否為可附加成員，在此情況下這是可附加成員的擁有者型別項目。This property only is relevant if the XAML namescope implementing property is an attachable member, in which case this is the attachable member's owner type. 否則，這個值可能是 null。Otherwise, this value may be null. 如果您需要報告的名稱範圍屬性的定義類型，在所有情況下，一般反映架構的邏輯，則您可以使用取代將屬性套用時遇到的型別`null`這個屬性。If you need general reflection-based logic that reports a namescope property's defining type in all cases, then you can substitute the type where the attribute is applied whenever you encounter `null` for this property.
